title: League of legends patch stuck at 0% 0 KBps
body: So Today I went on launched my league of legends client and there was a update  and I waited for about 2 hrs and I checked and saw that it was at 0% and 0 KBps and i have been searching how to fix this but nothing seemed to worked, I have already Reinstalled.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey guys,

This either seems to be an issue with the patcher itself and certain files becoming corrupted to the point where it cannot properly scan/recognize files already installed on your computer or is unable to connect to our Patcher Servers.  Given this, try the steps in the following article:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/28732434-Patching-Issues

These are some of the most common solutions for players being unable to patch properly.  Every single step is incredibly important, so make sure to complete all of them!

If you are still unable to patch and the "Launch" button never glows orange, then don't give up just yet!  Make sure to [submit a new request](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us here in Player Support.  We can work with you one-on-one to get this figured out and resolved.  if you do submit a ticket, include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
Could you renew the links please?
i need HELP ASAP someone reply on this when they see and i tell u what happened :(
i been struck at 0% for a whole day help me PLZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ
mine is at 0% then the Kbps is at 0 its sad i think its just my internet it but its not
Did you ever figure it out? I haven't been able to play since patch 4.19.  0%, 0kbps.  Ive let it sit for like 11 hours and I've tried everything on the internet.
Same problem here. Except the KBPS is like at 18
